name: Rubber Ducky Massacre
description:
A procedurally-generated 2D shooter, with a specific hatred towards rubber ducky's.

Run through an endless supply of areas, shooting through any guards that stand in your way, finding every rubber ducky, and burning them alive. One. By. One.  

Objects in the environment can be used to give you the upper hand, but make sure you always have ammo left for your flamethrower! You never know when you'll hear another quack...
